# Blacklist Positive Cases (Should Fail)

Each line below contains a blacklisted word and should trigger a violation.

1. We leverage advanced AI to solve problems.
2. The system is robust enough to handle failures.
3. Our seamless integration enables productivity.
4. This feature is pivotal to our success.
5. Security is crucial for our platform.
6. Teams leverage their existing tools.
7. The architecture is robust and scalable.
8. We provide seamless updates.
9. This decision is pivotal to the roadmap.
10. User feedback is crucial for iteration.
11. Engineers leverage new frameworks.
12. Tests make the codebase robust.
13. The API provides seamless access.
14. Performance is pivotal in production.
15. Documentation is crucial for onboarding.
16. We leverage microservices patterns.
17. The deployment is robust against failures.
18. Integration is seamless with existing tools.
19. This milestone is pivotal for launch.
20. Monitoring is crucial for observability.
